lj.lj_ly: the captain revved the engines and put them in gear.
lj.lj_ls: 机长加快发动机转速，使其进入工作状态。

lj.lj_ly: I've got to get my act in gear.
she took the engine out of gear.
sometimes his brain seems to slip out of gear.
lj.lj_ls: 有时候，他的脑袋好像不听使唤了。

jx.jx_en_mean: change to a lower (or higher) gear

lj.lj_ls: 全国已经进入备战状态。

jx.jx_en_mean: adjust or adapt something to make it suitable for (someone or something)
jx.jx_cn_mean: （为适应某人或某事）对（某物）进行调整（或改造）

jx.jx_en_mean: equip someone or something for a particular purpose

lj.lj_ly: a city not &B{geared up to} an outdoor lifestyle.
lj.lj_ls: 一个还没有为户外生活方式做好准备的城市。

jx.jx_en_mean: To get ready for a coming action or event
jx.jx_cn_mean: 为…准备好：为一将要发生的行动或事件做好准备

lj.lj_ly: a group of investors who had geared up for the takeover fight.
lj.lj_ls: 已经为兼并做好准备的一群投资人

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: of Scandinavian origin; compare with Old Norse gervi. Early senses expressed the general meaning 'equipment or apparatus', later 'mechanism': hence sense 1 (early 19th cent.)

entry.def: The gears on a machine or vehicle are a device for changing the rate at which energy is changed into motion.

example.ex: On hills, he must use low gears...
example.tran: 在山上,他必须挂低速挡。

example.ex: The car was in fourth gear...

entry.def: The gear involved in a particular activity is the equipment or special clothing that you use.

example.ex: About 100 officers in riot gear were needed to break up the fight.
example.tran: 大约需要100名穿防暴服的警察前来制止这场斗殴。

example.ex: I used to wear trendy gear but it just looked ridiculous.
example.tran: 我以前常穿新潮的衣服，但看上去却滑稽可笑。

entry.def: Some people refer to illegal drugs, especially heroin, as gear .

example.ex: Are these people using gear and amphetamines at the same time?
example.tran: 这些人同时服用海洛因和安非他明吗？

entry.tran: 使为…而准备；使为了达到…而作好准备
entry.def: If someone or something is geared to or towards a particular purpose, they are organized or designed in order to achieve that purpose.

example.ex: Colleges are not always geared to the needs of mature students...
example.tran: 大学有时满足不了成人学生的需求。

example.ex: My training was geared towards winning gold in Munich.
example.tran: 我为了在慕尼黑夺取金牌而进行训练。

means.word_mean: 1. a toothed wheel that engages another toothed mechanism in order to change the speed or direction of transmitted motion
2. a mechanism for transmitting motion by gears for some specific purpose (as the steering gear of a vehicle)
3. equipment consisting of miscellaneous articles needed for a particular operation or sport etc.
1. set the level or character of;

sentences.sentence: "She pitched her speech to the teenagers in the audience"

list.explanation: 处于最活跃、快速、最见效阶段，商速，全力进行

example.en: The auto industry is in high gear.

auth_sentence.content: Is he really the guy that does Top Gear?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is he really the guy that does Top Gear?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is he really the guy that does Top Gear?

auth_sentence.content: Start gently in second gear, avoiding high revs.
auth_sentence.res_content: Start gently in second gear, avoiding high revs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Start gently in second gear, avoiding high revs.

auth_sentence.content: BMX bikes use a single gear throughout the race.
auth_sentence.res_content: BMX bikes use a single gear throughout the race.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: BMX bikes use a single gear throughout the race.

My family has tons of camping gear.
She has got camping gear for rent

means.word_mean: 用具, 设备, 衣服

sentences.en: They put the hunting gear into the boat.
sentences.cn: 他们把打猎工具放在小船上。

means.word_mean: 齿轮; 传动装置; (排)挡

sentences.en: This large gear turns the small one.
sentences.cn: 这个大齿轮带动那个小齿轮。

sentences.en: You have to gear down when you drive uphill.
sentences.cn: 上坡行驶时必须换慢挡。

means.word_mean: 使兴奋起来; 使准备好

sentences.en: The party is all geared up for the forthcoming election campaign.
sentences.cn: 该党为即将来临的竞选活动做好了准备。

means.word_mean: 用齿轮连接；使接上齿轮

sentences.en: An automobile moves when the motor is geared to the rear wheels.
sentences.cn: 汽车的发动机连接于后轮时，汽车开动了。

jushi.english: Tom changed gear and he won the game at last.
jushi.chinese: 汤姆突然加速最后赢得了比赛。

jushi.english: A car can't go unless it is in gear.
jushi.chinese: 汽车若不把传动机构联系好就不能开动。

jushi.english: This large gear turns the small one.
jushi.chinese: 这个大齿轮带动那个小齿轮。
